intro: Cryptoceras modestum, commonly known as the modest cryptoceras, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its distinctive, palmate leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are clustered in inflorescences, often resembling a crown. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its unique morphology and habitat, it is of interest to botanists studying plant adaptation in tropical ecosystems.
